means: （貌似在商店购物实则行窃的）商店窃贼

PerfectNetExp.abs: script的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... chef n.厨师... shoplifter n.商店扒手... internet 因特网，互联网.
说小偷的英语单词都有哪些？怎么区别？_爱问知识人 ... stealer 偷干者 shoplifter 商店货物扒手 robber 抢劫者.

PerfectNetExp.exp: 冒充顾客在商店行窃者
PerfectNetExp.abs: 五年级第一学期英语单词... ... kidnapper n. 绑架者，劫持者 49 shoplifter n. 冒充顾客在商店行窃者 50 thief n. 窃贼，小偷 51.

list.abs: those kids are no minor shoplifters . they steal expensive cars and jewelry . this is grand theft we're talking about .那些小鬼可不是小扒手，他们偷的是昂贵汽车与珠宝，我们现在谈的可是重窃盗罪。
unfortunately , after experiencing these consequences a few times , most anybody would just let shoplifters go as these employees did .不幸的是，如同这些店员在经历了多次的体验后，店员多会让这些小偷离开。
the retailers maintain that the auction sites have facilitated the growth of the shoplifting rings .零售商认为，拍卖网站有利于增长的高买戒指。
He caught a shoplifter ., 他抓了一名商店扒手.
a shoplifter was caught red-handed trying to steal a watch from a jewelry store .一个小偷在一家珠宝店企图偷走一只手表的时候被当场擒获。

entry.def: If someone shoplifts, they steal goods from a shop by hiding them in a bag or in their clothes.

example.ex: He openly shoplifted from a supermarket...
They had shoplifted thousands of dollars' worth of merchandise.
example.tran: 他们已经偷了商店价值好几千美元的商品。

means.word_mean: 1. a thief who steals goods that are in a store

auth_sentence.content: Like a shoplifter, crying with relief at being caught.
auth_sentence.res_content: Like a shoplifter, crying with relief at being caught.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Like a shoplifter, crying with relief at being caught.

auth_sentence.content: When he tried to leave, he was accused by a security man of being a shoplifter.
auth_sentence.res_content: When he tried to leave, he was accused by a security man of being a shoplifter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When he tried to leave, he was accused by a security man of being a shoplifter.

auth_sentence.content: It said it found an example of a shoplifter who was caught by police and sentenced in court two hours later.
auth_sentence.res_content: It said it found an example of a shoplifter who was caught by police and sentenced in court two hours later.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It said it found an example of a shoplifter who was caught by police and sentenced in court two hours later.

means.word_mean: (貌似在商店购物实则行窃的)商店窃贼

sentences.en: The store detective was keeping a close eye on a suspected shoplifter.
sentences.cn: 商店的保安当时正严密监视一个可疑的商店扒手。

sentences.en: The store detective told the shoplifter that the game was up.
sentences.cn: 该商店侦探告诉冒充顾客进商店行窃的扒手,他已被发现了。

sentences.en: The shoplifter’s day of reckoning came when he was charged with 30 cases of theft.
sentences.cn: 那个冒充顾客进商店行窃的扒手被指控盗窃30次,他遭报应的日子来临了。
